name: Eyes in the Dark
description:
Eyes in the Dark

Made for the Brackey's Game Jam. Theme: You are not Alone

Instructions
  • WASD to move
  • Shift to spring
  • Space to use weapon
  • 1234 to switch weapons
Credits:

All art, code, game design by AnnaAD.

Sounds:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=42s2UM1HjY4 (Kevin MacLeod)
